text: Reiner Modest (born 6 July 1949) is a Danish rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Danish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Denmark Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Frederiksberg
title: Reiner Modest
